trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_SEQ_00<tab>Bujir knew you would be coming.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the Uyagir Caves and slay any enemies that appear.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_000<tab>Welcome, adventurer. Ibakha told me you would be coming.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_001<tab>She sees events long before they come to pass.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_002<tab>However, she did not only see you. No, she also foresaw a great threat.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_003<tab>The true nature of this threat is yet unclear, but we know it lurks in the Uyagir Caves. Please investigate it on our behalf.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_004<tab>The true nature of this threat is yet unclear, but we know it lurks in the Uyagir Caves. Please investigate it on our behalf.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_010<tab>Pray tell me, just what did you find?
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_011<tab>A bird of prophecy? I must thank you for slaying it. That cave contains the minerals we use to create pigment.

TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_012<tab>Without those minerals, we could not paint images on the walls of our cave─images which show the danger of giving in to one's greed. We do this every full moon so that future generations may inherit our values.
TEXT_STMBDZ618_02796_BUJIR_000_013<tab>My sincerest thanks for all your help. We owe you a great debt.
